ygData.subject: Welp... it was me :)
ygData.msgSnippet: So by GAME OVER did he mean he was retiring his bard and/or quitting EQ altogether?  If so then I say don t let the door hit you on the ass on the way out.
ygData.messageBody:
So by "GAME OVER" did he mean he was retiring his bard and/or quitting EQ
altogether? If so then I say don't let the door hit you on the ass on the
way out. To roll for and loot a magic item like that only to "complete your
set" and then retire your character is an example of EQ greediness at its
worst. If he had no intention of ever using the weapon, he should have let
someone loot who could have actually used it.

Galtin of E'ci

> Yes, Innoruuk drops it, my guild got one a few nights ago. It was awarded
> to another bard with a lot more Planar experience than I have. He now has
> the whole set of weapons and Imbrued. In his words "It took 10 months,
> but
> GAME OVER".
>
> > >
> > > you left out dawnchaser a 11/25 piercer.
>
